name: Tukang Bakso Simulator (TBS)
description:
Tukang Bakso Simulator is a game featuring a meatballs Indonesian cuisine namely Bakso.

Who is not familiar with this culinary one. No need expensive capital to feel the sensation of becoming a Meatball entrepreneur because now you can try to serve it by yourself in this game.

Are you ready to feel the sensation of being a Meatball entrepreneur?. Continue to play and improve your recipe, make it more festive and interesting. FREE and guaranteed addictive!

Agility and fast presentation is what you need to play this game because customer satisfaction is the first!.

Come on Serve, starving customers are already lining up in front of your stalls, serve them quickly, do not let them get angry!.

Serve as many customers and become a famous Meatball entrepreneur!
